title: Online Intercultural Language Education Design: Practical Competence Enhancement via Interpretive Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Cross-Cultural Communication Experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on analyzing and practicing intercultural communication scenarios in offline classroom environments utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners are assessed on their ability to analyze real cross-cultural situations (e.g., mask-wearing practices) from an interpretive perspective.
Learners demonstrate techniques to mediate and adjust peers' cultural interpretations during classroom interactions.
Learners develop two or more activity modules reflecting interpretive approaches in the learning design phase.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
